fse.forecast.menu.sort.name: Name
fse.forecast.menu.header.title: Ferngill Economic Forecast
fse.forecast.menu.tab.title: Forecast
fse.config.EnabledDynamicEcon: Enables Dynamic Econ Mode (requires game restart)
fse.config.DaysToSupplyChangeTooltip: The # of days from the start of the year until the supply is reset (112 is a year)
fse.config.MaxSupply: Max Supply, Calculated will not exceed this value
fse.config.DeltaArrow: Change Per Day Per displayed arrow
fse.config.DaysToDeltaChangeTooltip: The # of days from the start of the month until the delta is reset
fse.config.StdDevDeltaOutOfSeason: Out of Season Standard Deviation Delta
fse.config.category.subtitle: The game must be restarted after this is changed. Names may appear duplicated as that is how the game references them. Check the wiki for specifics.
